author: Staff Reporter
text:
A van carrying factory workers attached to a private readymade garment factory at Tiruneermalai overturned on Pallavaram-Thoraipakkam Radial Road on Wednesday morning, injuring 15.

The van driven by E. Udhaya (23) was nearing a traffic signal when a four-wheeler in front of it suddenly took a right turn. To avoid hitting the vehicle, the driver swerved to his left and hit a pedestrian Loganathan (50) and the vehicle landed on a trench on the side of the road.
title: 15 injured in accident
